blocks.text: Voss activates a holo-projector. The air above his desk shimmers and resolves into a three-dimensional map of Hive Tertium's lower levels — a tangled nightmare of collapsed tunnels, abandoned manufactory blocks, and fungal growth zones that haven't seen daylight in centuries.

The cult's activity is centered here — Subsector Morwen-9, in the deep underhive. A former Ecclesiarchy chapel complex, abandoned after the Sector Plague of 803.M41. The area is now controlled by competing ganger factions, mutant clans, and whatever else festers in the dark.
blocks.speaker: Inquisitor Voss

blocks.text: Red markers pulse on the holo-map. Each one represents a psychic disturbance — a spike in Warp energy recorded by the sector's detection equipment. They form a pattern, you notice. Not random. A spiral, tightening inward toward a single point.

Interrogator Castiel will serve as your handler and field commander. Throne Agent Drax provides operational security. Magos Rhyn-7 is tasked with cataloguing any archeotech or heretical artifacts recovered. And you... you are the blade I am pointing at the enemy's throat.
blocks.speaker: Inquisitor Voss

blocks.text: The servo-skull Macharius will accompany you. Consider it my eyes. And my judgment.
blocks.speaker: Inquisitor Voss

blocks.text: [SYSTEM] Quest Available: 'The Whisper in the Dark' — Investigate the Whispering Choir cult in the underhive of Hive Tertium.
Before you are deployed, I want you tested. Astropath Seren will evaluate your psychic stability in the Sanctum. I need to know what you are capable of — and what you might become.
blocks.speaker: Inquisitor Voss

choices.text: "What do we know about the cult's leadership? Their numbers? Their doctrine?"
"Will we have extraction support? Medical? Reinforcements if things go wrong?"
"The ganger factions — can any be leveraged? An enemy of my enemy..."
Nod. You have the mission parameters. Words are a luxury in the Inquisition's service.
